teams.about:
I'm Wanda Crohar√©, web developer, UX/UI designer and digital strategist.
With 14 years of experience, I've worked with entrepreneurs and companies to bring their ideas to life.
I love creating functional, clear and well-thought-out products for you. I believe in technology and design with purpose. The power of good ideas!
I also love coffee, books and chocolate.

item1.title: Custom web design and development
item1.desc: From institutional sites to complex platforms: responsive, clean and functional frontend development, optimized for all devices.

item2.title: UX/UI & prototyping
item2.desc: User-centered design: wireframes, interactive prototypes, usability testing and delightful microinteractions.

item3.title: AI, design & innovation consulting
item3.desc: I help you integrate artificial intelligence, optimize processes or improve your brand or product's digital experience.

item4.title: Project management
item4.desc: I lead digital teams and projects end-to-end, applying agile methodologies so everything flows (and gets delivered on time).

item5.title: Creative solutions for unique ideas
item5.desc: Do you have a crazy, artistic, technical or impossible project? Let's talk. I love challenges.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.desc1:
I'm always interested in UX/UI design projects, frontend development, web craft, WordPress, and digital consulting.
I'm excited about new ideas and businesses about to be born!
contact.question: Do you have something in mind?
contact.desc2: Write to me and let's make it happen.
